description: The party finally gets to use the hot springs of Arcanretia. But Aqua`s insistence on looking out for her followers leads the citizens to the wrong conclusions.

titles.title: A Goddess for This Corrupt Hot Springs Town!
Kono Fujou na Onsengai ni Megami o!
Une déesse dans cette station thermale nocive !
この不浄な温泉街に女神を!
為不淨的溫泉城鎮獻上女神！
